name: my baby care hair spa saloon game - makeover,dressup & look like sister! pro
name_original: my baby care hair spa saloon game - makeover,dressup & look like sister! pro
description:
Baby Charlotte and friends badly need a makeover! Help her achieve that perfect look this season.

It’s time for babies to shine out with the prettiest and coolest hair styles in the world with Baby Hair salon makeover! You can cut, wash, dry, curl, color your baby’s hair and even add on earrings, necklaces, or sunglasses!

Exciting to create the most beautiful and awesome styles!
Perfect your techniques and become the next Baby Hair Salon Superstar!
